titleStmt.title: The soul's communion with her savior. Or, The history of our Lord Jesus Christ, written by the four evangelists digested into devotional meditations. The first part.
titleStmt.author: Traherne, Philip, d. ca. 1725.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Crooke at the Green Dragon nigh Devereux-Court without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: The preface is signed: P. Traheron.
Cf. Wing, which has "Savvior" in title.
In two books, each with caption title; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
